tweet.html: RT @Dodis: George Shultz, Labor and Treasury Secretary for Nixon and Secretary of State under Reagan, passed away at 100 on Saturday. Explore the documents of Swiss diplomacy on the activities of this US foreign policy giant we have on Dodis so far: dodis.ch/P46714 @HistoryAtState
